meanings.sent1: The cake had a sweetish flavor that pleased everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The sweetish strawberries were a hit at the farmer's market.
meanings.sent3: The sweetish tea made the kids think they were drinking a magical potion.
meanings.sent4: The sweetish scent of flowers filled the air with a delicate sweetness.
meanings.sent5: The sweetish candy melted in her mouth, leaving a sugary aftertaste.

meanings.sent1: The sweetish apple pie was a delightful treat after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The sweetish sauce complemented the savory meat perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The sweetish ice cream made her smile with each spoonful.
meanings.sent4: The sweetish melody of the song lingered in her mind long after it ended.
meanings.sent5: The sweetish aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.sent1: Her sweetish smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The sweetish scent of the flowers attracted bees to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The sweetish taste of victory lingered on their tongues.
meanings.sent4: The sweetish memories of childhood brought a nostalgic tear to her eye.
meanings.sent5: The sweetish voice of the singer captivated the audience.
